revised_title: Observations on the Effects of Membrana Tympani Destruction and an Account of an Operation for Deafness Treatment
tldr: The author examines the effects of membrana tympani destruction and proposes an operation for treating deafness caused by Eustachian tube obstruction. The operation involves puncturing the membrana tympani to allow air to flow freely and restore the ear's ability to vibrate and hear.
